version_description:
-Fix problem for iOS7
-Support iPhone6s/6sPlus
-Fix other bugs.

-Fix thumbnail aspect ratio problem
-Fix PagePreview image problem
-Fix Bookshelf problem (iPadPro)
-Fix HTTPD crash problem

-Add don't sleep function.
-Fix Bookshelf long press problem.
-Fix bookmark problem.

-New Filelist-view and bookshelf.
-Support WebP image format.
-Suppurt .7z

[9.01]
-fix problem at Version9.00


[9.00]
-New Filelist-view and bookshelf.
-Support WebP image format.
-Suppurt .7z

[9.02]
-fix problem at Version9.00 and Version9.01


[9.00]
-New Filelist-view and bookshelf.
-Support WebP image format.
-Suppurt .7z

Fix bugs.

-To improved processing speed in thumbs processing.
-Fix crash-bug at download functions.
-Other bugs.

Bug Fixes
-Download folder problem
-Other problems

-Support Dropbox v2 API
Please reregistration using "Add Dropbox account"

-Fix bugs.

-Support iOS10

-Fix Dropbox account management.
-Add Image filter
-Fix sort problem in OneDrive
-Fix other bugs.

-Support iOS10.3
-Fix file open problem(Korean, Japanese or other languages filename)
-Fix Drive login issue.

[9.11]
-Fix cloud file download problem.

[9.10]
-Support iOS10.3
-Fix file open problem(Korean, Japanese or other languages filename)
-Fix Drive login issue.

-Update DropboxAPI
-Improve Image filter settings
-Add multi file select download mode

-Support large zip-files over 4GB
-Fix boolshelf UI problem.
Fixed a bug that files may be lost when using iOS 10.3.3 and iTunes for Windows.
Fix crash problem when reading PDF
-Fix PDF Streaming problem.
Fixed a problem that bookshelf performance is slow in case of TouchID incompatible terminals.
-Support iPhoneX and iOS11

-Fix crash problem (on iPad)
-Fix layout problem
Fixed an issue where errors occurred when logging in to Dropbox.

Improved support for Support for iOS 12 and iPhoneXS Max.
Improved the resolution of bookshelf-background.
In this release, we fixed bugs and made performance improvements.
-Fixed a problem that a position shifted with book scan mode
-Perfor

-Fixed crash problem in "Open In..." Function.
-Fixed crash problem after save-image.

・Version9.42
-Fixed the problem that streaming does not start in remote book viewer.

This version is intended to fix bugs.
-Fixed a problem downloading file via SMB2.0.

-In this version, ComicGlass support the new iPad.
-Improved: ComicGlass locked folder can not be viewed with "File" app.
-Fixed a problem that the folder name could not be changed.
-Fix the crash bug.

-Fixed freezing problem in Locked folder.
-Fixed bug that file selection can not be seen.

-Fixed a problem that authentication failed when using SMB server (Media Server plus).
-Fixed a problem that the file list was not automatically updated when moving files or folders.

- 修复了无法从其他应用程序打开文件的问题
- 修复了无法在Dropbox中打开包含特定字符的文件夹的问题
